plot: The Banana King rules a cucumber patch and is overthrown by the royal vizier Dr. Algernon the snail who intends to pickle all the cucumbers until Madister the Muffin saves the day.
title: The Banana King
plot_es: The Banana King rules a cucumber patch and is overthrown by the royal vizier Dr. Algernon the snail who intends to pickle all the cucumbers until Madister the Muffin saves the day.
plot_en: The Banana King rules a cucumber patch and is overthrown by the royal vizier Dr. Algernon the snail who intends to pickle all the cucumbers until Madister the Muffin saves the day.
